keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.
map K previousTab
map J nextTab
searchEngines:
yt: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
dd: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo Search
di: https://duckduckgo.com/?iar=images&q=%s DuckDuckGo Images
gg: https://google.com/search?q=%s Google Search
gi: https://images.google.com/search?q=%s Google Images
